languages.text: "Меня больше удручает присутствие следов людей в том же самом месте. Под пеленой тайны скрывается некий темный союз, который явно страшнее обычной хладной сделки".
"I am more discouraged to see signs of humans in the same place. There is a dark alliance lurking beneath this veil of mystery, something far more frightening than any typical Cold Trade deal."
languages.original_text: "Меня больше удручает присутствие следов людей в том же самом месте. Под пеленой тайны скрывается некий темный союз, который явно страшнее обычной хладной сделки".

traits.locale_text: "I am more discouraged to see signs of humans in the same place. There is a dark alliance lurking beneath this veil of mystery, something far more frightening than any typical Cold Trade deal."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am more discouraged to see signs of humans in the same place. There is a dark alliance lurking beneath this veil of mystery, something far more frightening than any typical Cold Trade deal."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “更让我感到遗憾的是，我又在那样的巢穴里看到了人类的痕迹。在这神秘的面纱下，潜伏着某个邪恶的联盟，比所有典型的冷市贸易都要更加可怕。”
languages.original_text: "I am more discouraged to see signs of humans in the same place. There is a dark alliance lurking beneath this veil of mystery, something far more frightening than any typical Cold Trade deal."

traits.locale_text: “更让我感到遗憾的是，我又在那样的巢穴里看到了人类的痕迹。在这神秘的面纱下，潜伏着某个邪恶的联盟，比所有典型的冷市贸易都要更加可怕。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je m'inquiète plutôt des traces d'activité humaine décelées au même endroit. Une alliance des plus sombres semble avoir été scellée derrière ce voile de mystère, quelque chose de bien plus effrayant que tout ce qui touche au Commerce Froid. »
languages.original_text: "I am more discouraged to see signs of humans in the same place. There is a dark alliance lurking beneath this veil of mystery, something far more frightening than any typical Cold Trade deal."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'inquiète plutôt des traces d'activité humaine décelées au même endroit. Une alliance des plus sombres semble avoir été scellée derrière ce voile de mystère, quelque chose de bien plus effrayant que tout ce qui touche au Commerce Froid. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Más me preocupa la presencia de humanos en el mismo lugar. Hay una alianza siniestra bajo esta capa de misterios, algo mucho más aterrador que los negocios típicos del Comercio Frío».
languages.original_text: "I am more discouraged to see signs of humans in the same place. There is a dark alliance lurking beneath this veil of mystery, something far more frightening than any typical Cold Trade deal."

traits.locale_text: «Más me preocupa la presencia de humanos en el mismo lugar. Hay una alianza siniestra bajo esta capa de misterios, algo mucho más aterrador que los negocios típicos del Comercio Frío».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「俺にすれば、人間が同じ場所にいる形跡を見つけたことのほうが残念だ。この神秘のヴェールの真下に闇の同盟が存在しているとは、普通の冷たき取引のどんな協定よりもはるかに恐ろしい」
languages.original_text: "I am more discouraged to see signs of humans in the same place. There is a dark alliance lurking beneath this veil of mystery, something far more frightening than any typical Cold Trade deal."

traits.locale_text: 「俺にすれば、人間が同じ場所にいる形跡を見つけたことのほうが残念だ。この神秘のヴェールの真下に闇の同盟が存在しているとは、普通の冷たき取引のどんな協定よりもはるかに恐ろしい」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Mich entmutigt es eher, Anzeichen von Menschen am selben Ort zu sehen. Unter diesem Schleier des Mysteriums lauert ein dunkles Bündnis. Etwas, was noch viel furchterregender ist als ein gewöhnliches Geschäft mit dem Kalthandel."
languages.original_text: "I am more discouraged to see signs of humans in the same place. There is a dark alliance lurking beneath this veil of mystery, something far more frightening than any typical Cold Trade deal."

traits.locale_text: "Mich entmutigt es eher, Anzeichen von Menschen am selben Ort zu sehen. Unter diesem Schleier des Mysteriums lauert ein dunkles Bündnis. Etwas, was noch viel furchterregender ist als ein gewöhnliches Geschäft mit dem Kalthandel."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am more discouraged to see signs of humans in the same place. There is a dark alliance lurking beneath this veil of mystery, something far more frightening than any typical Cold Trade deal."

languages.text: "Aynı yerlerde insan izleri görmek canımı sıkıyor. Bu gizem örtüsünün altında karanlık bir ittifak, sıradan bir Soğuk Ticaret anlaşmasından çok daha korkunç bir şey var."
languages.original_text: "I am more discouraged to see signs of humans in the same place. There is a dark alliance lurking beneath this veil of mystery, something far more frightening than any typical Cold Trade deal."
